column5: Potential new world record catfish , and the bait  http://cosmos.bcst.yahoo.com/up/player/popup/index.php?rn=222562&cl=20984565&ch=222562&src=canadanews
Them Americans have some mighty good catfishin waters!!!
The Fox news reporter sounds like the biggest redneck on the planet. Where the heck did they get this guy?
you want rednecks and Asian Carp? check this out  http://channel.nationalgeographic.com/series/monster-fish#tab-Videos/08361_00
Redneck or not, that looks like a riot!
The bow hunting looks cooler, but the Giant Catfish is sweet. And the redneck fishing is pretty awesome as well!

I wonder if there are any tournament restrictions like mounting a set of electro-shockers on your boat and going to town with a few nets like these  http://www.leslies-luton.co.uk/store/product/2194208/CATFISH-PRO-CATFISH-LANDING-NET-60in/  I might not be a redneck, but I definitely have a few tactics to use out thereâ€¦Any benefactors willing to sponsor me with a boat and some $?  Properly working live wells not necessary  Rotenone suppliers are very welcome as sponsors
I'm thinking that the best use for asian carp is fertilizer.

Reports are they are excellent table fare and I read somewhere they will start being farmed from the wild. I think there is a name contest to get away from the carp and you'll start seeing them in restaurants as silverfin. From latest infishermen I think
Actually, that sucks. If there's money to be made then we'll never get rid of them and there will be lobby groups opposing any attempts to eradicate them.
